title._content: Maple Leaf Store (J. H. Cavanah, Proprietor) And The Lethbridge Hotel

description._content: 1885 Copy 1 & copy 3 18 cm x 12.7 cm Copy 2 9.6 cm x 7.4 cm 2 Black and white copy prints Photograph of J. H. Cavanah's Maple Leaf Store and the Lethbridge Hotel located on 5th Street South between 2nd and 3rd Avenues. Two men are standing in front of the store. John Henry Cavanah, owner of Maple Leaf Store, was a member of the Chinook Bicycle Club ( 1894). He was a A Lethbridge Board of Trade Executive Council Member (1889) and was elected to Town Council with the highest number of votes (223) in 1891. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19760208067
